text: Time is a single by Marion released early 1996. ==Track listing== All songs written by Harding/Grantham/Cunningham, words by Harding ===7" vinyl and CC=== # "Time" # "Chance" ===CD=== # "Time" # "Chance" # "Let's All Go Together (slide mix)" ==Personnel== * Jaime Harding - vocals * Tony Grantham - guitar * Phil Cunningham - guitar * Nick Gilbert - bass * Murad Mousa - drums ==External links== * Category:Marion (band) songs Category:1996 songs Category:Songs written by Phil Cunningham (rock musician) Category:Songs written by Jaime Harding
title: Time (Marion song)
